product_name: Big Agnes Air Core Sleeping Pad
long_description: The lightweight and compact Big Agnes Air Core sleeping pad helps ensure you enjoy a comfortable night's sleep on summertime backpacking trips. 3.25 in. thick pad is waterproof and lightweight, and packs down to the size of a Nalgene water bottle. I-Beam construction eliminates welded seams to reduce cold spots and ensure quick inflation and deflation. Nylon on the top and bottom stands up to regular use in the outdoors. R-Value of 1; comfort range to 35degF. The Big Agnes Air Core sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: The lightweight and compact Big Agnes Air Core sleeping pad helps ensure you enjoy a comfortable night's sleep on summertime backpacking trips.
